name: Racing Riders Z - Zombie Road
description:
Zombies plot a world invasion, starting with all of the raceways that begin with the letter "Z". You must travel to the world cities that begin with the letter "Z" and outrace the Zombies and take the golden trophy from their grasp!

-Zombies invade the raceway

-Race the "Z" lettered cities

-Random Crossroads send you to unknown destinations
